humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the patient has no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph node (SLN), and only 1 lymph node was assessed (0/1, SLN). Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions pNO (0/1, SLN), which indicates that no cancer was found in the sentinel lymph node (0/1) and the lymph node was examined (SLN). This is consistent with N0, which means no regional lymph node metastasis.
